descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Zion Williamson grabs a defensive rebound and gets a head of steam to score on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zion gets coast-to-coast bucket early) 2021/2/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zion gets coast-to-coast bucket early

videos.description: Zion Williamson hits Josh Hart in stride with a bounce pass to set up an easy layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hart scores off of Zion's dime in transition) 2021/2/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hart scores off of Zion's dime in transition

videos.description: Zion Williamson races up the court and Eurosteps between two Pistons defenders to score just before halftime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zion weaves through traffic to beat halftime buzzer) 2021/2/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zion weaves through traffic to beat halftime buzzer

videos.description: Mason Plumlee scores in the post and then swats a shot off the backboard before scoring again with an alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Plumlee takes over on both ends) 2021/2/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Plumlee takes over on both ends

videos.description: Zion Williamson closes the third quarter with a sweet spin move and score through contact.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zion goes spin cycle for and-1 basket) 2021/2/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zion goes spin cycle for and-1 basket
